description:
The new M-PESA App makes it easier to transact on M-PESA. 

The new app enables you to view your M-PESA balance in the home screen, Favorites lets you save your most frequently used features so that they're just a click away. Frequently used contacts and till numbers are automatically displayed so that you can quickly find them to send money or make payments.

·	Biometrics
Login to the myM-PESA app conveniently and authenticate payments by scanning your fingerprint or face ID.

·	Send money easily
Send money by scanning a QR code, searching your phonebook or selecting from your frequent M-PESA contacts. You can also add contacts to your favorites list so you don't have to search every time.

·	Pay Bills
Pay your bills easier by selecting from the popular M-PESA bills, scanning a QR code or by selecting from one of your favorite or frequent bills

·	Buy Goods and services
Pay for your goods and services by manually inserting the till number, scanning a QR code or by selecting one of your favorite and frequent used tills.

·	Pay to Phone Number
This is a new payment service that allows customers to pay small businesses for their goods and services

·	Withdraw
Withdraw money from your M-PESA at any agent or at selected bank ATMs

·	Buy Airtime
Buy airtime conveniently with M-PESA for yourself or for your family and friends

app_name: Chapeo Cash: Loan App In Kenya
description:
Meet your financial requirement——Chapeo Cash 

Chapeo Cash is your fast and easy solution to all your financial needs. We also ensures quick loan approval, making it the ultimate loan app in Kenya.
Please ensure that you are 18 years of age or older before using the relevant products and/or services.

Why Choose Chapeo Cash?

1. Quick Loans: 
Get instant cash up to Ksh 100,000! Resolve financial emergencies without waiting with our accessible online loans.

2. Flexible Repayment:
Life can be unpredictable, so we offer repayment terms from 91 to 121 days, making repayments convenient for you.

3. Instant Loan Approval:
No collateral, no lengthy paperwork, and no delays. Enjoy immediate access to funds in your bank account without the hassle of long queues.

4. Credit limit amounts:  Ksh 1,000 to Ksh 100,000

5. Daily interest: 
Interest is charged on the amount of credit you borrow, ranging from 0.03% to 0.06% (APR:11%-22%)

6. Secure & Safe:
Benefit from advanced privacy and security measures to protect your information.

Your Need + Our Loan App = Your Ideal Choice

- Zero service charge for bill payments.
- Exclusive discounts on airtime and data purchases.
- Instant cash with quick loans.
- 100% digital application with no hidden fees.
- No collateral required for salary or online loans.

Ready To Begin?

1. Download the Chapeo Cash App:
  - Complete a quick and easy registration in minutes.
  - Apply for a loan and get instant approval.
  - Experience financial freedom with immediate deposits in your bank account.


Dive into the Numbers with a Loan Example:
- Loan Amount = Ksh 5,000
- Loan Period = 121 days
- Annual Interest Rate = 18.1%
- Total Interest = Ksh 5,000 * 18.1% * 121/365 = Ksh 300
- Total Repayment Amount = Ksh 5,000 + Ksh 300 = Ksh5,300


Contact Us:

We’re always excited to hear from you! For feedback or questions, please contact us:

- Email: customer.service@chapeo.club
- Phone: 0207905107
- Address: 33 Spring Valley Road Nairobi, Kenya.
- Website: https://www.chapeo.club

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

description:
Co-op Bank App: Your Digital Banking partner
 
Experience the future of banking with Co-op Bank App, the innovative mobile banking app from Co-operative Bank. Enjoy a wide range of features designed to simplify your financial life:
 
Key Features:

Account Management
  • View account balances and detailed transaction history
  • Transfer funds between your accounts instantly
  • Set up standing orders and direct debits
  • Create a Co-op Till easily and fast

Card Management
  • View and manage all your Co-op Bank cards in one place
  • Create virtual cards for online and subscription payments
  • Manage your card:
   - Deposit funds to your Credit or Virtual card, 
   - Withdraw from your Credit or Virtual card
   - View card details (full card number, CVV, and expiry date) to use on your favorite online services
  • Access More Card Services to:
   - Reset your PIN
   - Block or unblock your card
   - View card statement and transaction history
   - Check card limits and spending insights
 
Bill Payments
  • Pay directly to M-Pesa Paybill and M-Pesa Till from your account
  • Settle utility bills - KPLC, Nairobi Water, GoTV, DSTV, Zuku
  • Pay government fees (eCitizen, KRA)
  • Make school fee payments seamlessly
 
Money Transfers
  • Send money to Co-op Bank accounts and wallets instantly
  • Send to mobile money - M-Pesa and Airtel Money
  • Transfer to other local banks via PesaLink or RTGS
  • Send money internationally through Co-op Remit and SWIFT
  • Deposit to your Co-op account directly from M-Pesa
  • Buy M-Pesa float quickly and conveniently
  • Withdraw cash from your account without a card at any Co-op ATM or Co-op Kwa Jirani agent seamlessly
 
Airtime
  • Buy Safaricom and Airtel airtime for yourself and loved ones instantly
 
Mobile Loans
  • Apply for loans and get instant approval
  • Make repayments and view loan statements easily
  • Access all your Co-op and partner loan facilities in one place
 
Security
  • Bank with confidence using advanced security features
  • Multi-layer authentication and instant fraud protection
 
Take control of your finances with ease.
Download the Co-op Bank App today - secure, fast, and made for you.

Borrow up to KES 100,000 anytime with FairKash! Our entirely digital and paperless application process approves you in minutes with no documentation needed. Apply once and withdraw cash as often as you need. We offer the most flexible credit line in Kenya. 

Why FairKash?
1.Up to KES 100,000 limit: Get approved once and borrow whenever needed. Hassle-free experience: Get approved once and re-borrow whenever you need in just a few taps. No more waiting or new applications required.
2. Fast cash: Get approved in minutes and money sent to your account right away. We make borrowing simple.
3. Flexible repayments: Choose an installment plan or pay interest/principal whenever you want. Funds in your account instantly! Couldn't be easier!
4. Simple and safe: No hidden fees. Strict privacy and security regulated by Central Bank of Kenya. Trusted by 1 million+ Kenyans.

We provide unsecured personal loans from KES 3,000 to KES 100,000 with flexible repayment period from 91 days to 365 days. The minimum APR is 15% and maximum APR is 34% in compliance with the credit regulations. Grow your credit limit up to KES 100,000 by paying back on time!

Representative example:
Apply for a loan with period 120 days, Loan Principal is KES 10,000, Interest Fee Rate is 8%, Service Fee Rate is 2.5%, Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is 32%. 
- Loan Principal: KES 10,000 (120 days)
- Total Interest Fee: KES 800 (KES 10,000 * 8%)
- Total Service Fee: KES 250 (KES 10,000 * 2.5%)
- Total Fee Cost: KES 1,050 (KES 800 + KES 250)
- Repayment Amount: KES 11,050 (KES 10,000 + KES 800 + KES 250)

Who can Apply？
1. Any Kenyan citizen over 20 years old
2. Have a valid ID and mobile number

How to Get a Loan？ 
1. Download the FairKash app 
2. Register with your phone number 
3. Enter your basic info and loan request 
4. Get approved instantly and receive money in minutes—deposited directly into your account

Join 1 million+ Kenyans enjoying freedom and flexibility with FairKash. Apply once, borrow often, pay on your terms! Life's hard enough, we make your money simple. Get the app and experience better borrowing.

Privacy and Permissions
FairKash take your privacy very seriously and promise to never share your information with third parties.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.

https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

If you’re looking for quick cash to handle an emergency or a personal expense, LendPlus has you covered. Our loan app Kenya provides instant loans that are easy to apply for, fast to process, and reliable. Whether you need extra money for a bill or want to cover unexpected expenses, LendPlus is one of the practical and convenient mpesa loans Kenya. LendPlus offers a loan solution tailored just for you.

Why Choose LendPlus?
Instant Access to Cash
LendPlus offers online loans that are processed quickly, allowing you to get money instantly in 1 to 15 min. No more waiting in long queues at banks – just download our loan app in Kenya, fill in your details and get approved in minutes. LendPlus is a loan app where you can get money anytime.
Simple and Convenient Application Process
Applying for a loan with LendPlus is as easy as a few taps on your phone. Our loans app Kenya is user-friendly and ensures that the process is hassle-free. Whether you need an instant loan or simply want to explore your credit options, LendPlus gives you the flexibility you deserve.
Flexible Repayment Options
We understand that each borrower has unique needs, so we offer flexible repayment terms that make it easier for you to manage your credits. 
For borrowers who are experiencing difficulties with repayments, we provide the option to extend the repayment term, offering greater flexibility to avoid defaults. With LendPlus, you are in control.
Credit Score Improvement
The LendPlus loan app allows clients to improve their credit history. If you repay your loans on time, you automatically improve your credit score. This can help you get larger loans on better terms in the future.
Loyalty Program
We have a loyalty program for our regular customers. Become our regular customer and receive bonuses and discounts. Participate in raffles and special promotions for loyal customers. Earn bonus points and exchange them for Airtime by M-Pesa.
Real-Time Loan Tracking
Our app allows you to track your loan status in real time — from application submission to disbursement and repayment. This feature enables our customers to stay informed about their credit situation and manage their loans efficiently with LendPlus.
Safe and Secure
Your privacy is our priority. LendPlus takes every measure to ensure that your data is protected with the highest level of security. Apply confidently, knowing that your personal information is safe with us.
Who can apply and what do you need for it?
Must be 18 years and older
Must have a stable income (whether employed or self-employed)
A valid mobile phone number connected to M-Pesa
A national ID for identity verification.
If you meet these requirements, you are eligible to apply for our online loans through our loans app in Kenya. It’s simple, fast, and secure!
How you can get money on credit in the LendPlus loan app:
1. Install the mobile app on your smartphone
2. Complete a short registration by providing the necessary details
3. Select the loan amount and repayment term
4. Confirm your application and wait for a decision
5. Review the loan contract terms and confirm it
6. Receive the money on your M-pesa within a few minutes
General information about online m-pesa loan in LendPlus loan app:
- Minimum loan term: 61 days
- Maximum loan term: 90 days
- Maximum loan amount: up to KES 150,000
- Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 32.85%
Typical loan calculation example:
If you apply for a loan of 10,000 KSH for 90 days, the total cost will be 10,810 KES, where 810 KES is the amount of interest.

Get Started Today!
With LendPlus securing a loan has never been easier. Download our loan app and experience the ease of getting cash whenever you need it. We’re here to help you every step of the way. Get started now and see why so many people trust LendPlus for their financial needs.
Privacy policy: https://lendplus.ke/privacy-policy-app-store/ 
You can contact our Customer Service center at customer@lendplus.ke

eCitizen is an online platform that provides government services and information to citizens of Kenya. It is a one-stop portal that allows individuals to access a wide range of government services and complete various transactions online.

eCitizen was launched by the Kenyan government in 2014 as part of its efforts to digitize public services and make them more accessible to citizens. The platform aims to streamline service delivery, reduce bureaucracy, and enhance efficiency in the delivery of government services.

eCitizen initiatives aim to enhance the quality of government services. Online platforms can offer personalized experiences, provide relevant information, and guide citizens through complex processes. Citizens can access up-to-date information, track the progress of their applications, and receive notifications and alerts regarding important updates. Improved service quality leads to greater citizen satisfaction and trust in government institutions.

Through the eCitizen portal, users can access services from different government agencies such as the Directorate of Immigration and Registration of Persons, the National Transport and Safety Authority, the Ministry of Lands, among others. Some of the services available on eCitizen include applying for passports, driver's licenses, birth certificates, national identification cards (IDs), business registration, and filing tax returns.

To use eCitizen, individuals need to create an account on the platform and provide their personal details. They can then log in and access the various services available. Payments for services can be made online using various payment methods such as credit/debit cards, mobile money, or bank transfers.

eCitizen has significantly simplified the process of accessing government services in Kenya. It has reduced the need for physical visits to government offices, saving time and effort for citizens. The platform has been successful in promoting transparency and accountability in service delivery and has contributed to the digital transformation of the Kenyan government.

The future of electronic citizen services is poised for significant growth and transformation. As governments around the world embrace digitalization, the concept of eCitizen is evolving to encompass a wide range of online services and interactions between citizens and government entities.

•	Save and earn rewards with Timiza Savings.

•	Deposit funds into Timiza.
•	Purchase insurance.
•	Buy airtime.
•	Pay for KPLC/ZUKU/DSTV/GOTV bills.
•	Pay bills via Till and pay bill accounts on Timiza
•	Withdraw funds via all Absa ATMs.
What are the requirements for a customer to have a Timiza Account?
•	Be a registered Safaricom Subscriber.
•	Be a registered Safaricom M-PESA customer.
•	Have an active Safaricom M-PESA account/line.
•	Hold a Kenyan National Identification Document (ID) Kindly note that Kenyan passports are not allowed.
Timiza Tariff and Guides
Please refer to the Timiza Tariff and frequently asked questions on the link below:

https://www.absabank.co.ke/personal/ways-to-bank/timiza/

Who is eligible for a Timiza Loan?
In order to qualify for a loan, you need to be an M-PESA subscriber for more than 6 months, actively use other Safaricom services such as voice, data and M-PESA. You will also need to have a good rating at the Credit Reference Bureau [CRB] and by Safaricom on Okoa Jahazi.  
What are the features of the Timiza Loan?
•	If you qualify, your loan limit will be displayed when you log in to your Timiza account 
        and you can borrow.
•	Timiza Loan attracts an interest charge of 1.083% charged once and a facilitation fee 	 
       of 5% of the amount borrowed for a term of 30 days. 
•	Loan is disbursed to the Customer’s Timiza account (not directly to M-PESA). The 
        Customer will access the funds by withdrawing from Timiza to M-PESA
•	To grow your loan limit:
        o	Increase activity on your TIMIZA Account by transacting on other services 	 
                offered on Timiza. For example, Deposit cash, Purchase airtime, Pay your utility 
                bills, Subscribe to Insurance.
        o	Open and Increase savings on your Zidisha savings account on Timiza
        o	Increase usage of M-PESA services
Absa Bank Kenya Plc is regulated by the Central Bank of Kenya.
